Twenty One Pilots - Drum Show song download

The song arrives with a captivating official video directed by Mark C. Eshleman for Reel Bear Media, with production support from Nathan Bielski and a full creative team that delivered the powerful visuals.

“Drum Show” continues to showcase Twenty One Pilots' unmatched ability to blend raw emotion, lyrical storytelling, and genre-bending sounds
